resources.string: Show player points, number of cars and stations left, number of realized/unrealized tickets. You can unlock the cards panel and add the card by pressing it or remove it by pressing and holding.
You can draw new car cards here. Add card by pressing it or remove by pressing and holding. Accept your choice by pressing "accept" button or reset the cards set by pressing "reset" button.

Show built routes. You can unlock the routes list and remove the route by pressing and holding it. To build a new one press the "Build a new route" button. First choose cities names. Then select proper car cards. Build the route by pressing "accept" button or reset the cards set by pressing "reset" button.

Show drawn tickets. You can unlock the ticket list and remove the ticket by pressing and holding it. To draw a new ticket press "Draw a ticket" button. First choose cities names. Then draw a ticket by pressing the "accept" button.

Show built stations. You can unlock the station list and remove the station by pressing and holding it. To build a new one press the "Build a new station" button. First choose cities names. Then select proper car cards. Build the station by pressing "accept" button or reset the cards set by pressing "reset" button.
